member.name: P:CodeSmith.Data.Caching.CacheSettings.Mode
member.summary: Gets or sets the cache expiration mode.

member.name: P:CodeSmith.Data.Caching.CacheSettings.Duration
member.summary: Gets or sets the cache duration.

remarks.para: When Mode is Sliding, Duration is the interval between the time the inserted object was last accessed and the time at which that object expires.
When Mode is Duration, Duration is used to calculate the absolute expiration from DateTime.UtcNow.

member.name: P:CodeSmith.Data.Caching.CacheSettings.AbsoluteExpiration
member.summary: Gets or sets the absolute expiration.
member.remarks: The time at which the inserted object expires and is removed from the cache. To avoid possible issues with local time such as changes from standard time to daylight saving time, use System.DateTime.UtcNow rather than System.DateTime.Now for this parameter value.

member.name: P:CodeSmith.Data.Caching.CacheSettings.Priority
member.summary: The cost of the object relative to other items stored in the cache, as expressed by the System.Web.Caching.CacheItemPriority enumeration. This value is used by the cache when it evicts objects; objects with a lower cost are removed from the cache before objects with a higher cost.

member.name: P:CodeSmith.Data.Caching.CacheSettings.CacheEmptyResult
member.summary: Used to determine if an empty result should be cached.

member.name: P:CodeSmith.Data.Caching.CacheSettings.CacheDependency
member.summary: The file or cache key dependencies for the item. When any dependency changes, the object becomes invalid and is removed from the cache. If there are no dependencies, this parameter contains null.

member.name: P:CodeSmith.Data.Caching.CacheSettings.CacheItemRemovedCallback
member.summary: A delegate that, if provided, will be called when an object is removed from the cache. You can use this to notify applications when their objects are deleted from the cache.

member.summary: Immediately deletes all entities from the collection with a single delete command.
member.typeparam: Represents the object type for rows contained in .
member.param: Represents a table for a particular type in the underlying database containing rows to be deleted.
Represents the collection of items which are to be removed from .
member.returns: The number of rows deleted from the database.

remarks.para: Similar to stored procedures, and opposite from DeleteAllOnSubmit, rows provided in will be deleted immediately with no need to call .
Additionally, to improve performance, instead of creating a delete command for each item in , a single delete command is created.
